Purchaser is encouraged to verify hours prior to purchase. This vessel is offered subject to prior sale, price change, or withdrawal without notice.

description:
Timeless, elegant, stylish and set up for entertaining, SHE’S A 10 is ready for her next owner to enjoy. Originally designed by Jon Bannenberg and Phil Curran, this 1989 164’ (49.9m) Oceanfast offers speed up to 30 knots at light load, agility and a shallow draft of 5’ 3” which is perfect for the Bahamas or other international cruising grounds. Sleeping 12 guests in 5 staterooms, the master is on the bridge deck with the 4 guest staterooms below. There is a media room on the main deck that can also convert into a 6th stateroom with shower and closet and storage.

Previously known as Mystique, SHE’S A 10 has only had 3 owners and shows well. With recent fresh hull paint, W-6’s on the engines and endless upgrades.

descriptions.title: Overview
descriptions.description:
Timeless, elegant, stylish and set up for entertaining, SHE’S A 10 is ready for her next owner to enjoy.  Originally designed by Jon Bannenberg and Phil Curran, this 1989 164’ (49.9m) Oceanfast offers speed up to 30 knots at light load, agility and a shallow draft of 5’ 3” which is perfect for the Bahamas or other international cruising grounds. Sleeping 12 guests in 5 staterooms, the master is on the bridge deck with the 4 guest staterooms below. There is a media room on the main deck that can also convert into a 6th stateroom with shower and closet and storage.

 

Previously known as Mystique, SHE’S A 10 has only had 3 owners and shows well. With recent fresh hull paint, W-6’s on the engines and endless upgrades, you can find a detailed list of updates below.

 

Key Features

  • Fast, shallow draft yacht with 3 x engines and 3 x KaMeWa waterjets
  • Open interior plan
  • W-6 on port engine (August 2020)
  • W-5 on starboard engine (August 2020)
  • Port engine 3 year / 3000-hour warranty begins November 2020
  • Generators being serviced (Sept 2020)
  • Jacuzzi on flybridge
  • Master on the bridge deck with private entrance to outside
  • Able to convert the media room on the main deck into a 6th ensuite stateroom
  • New hull paint in 2018
  • Ceramic coating on superstructure (January 2020)
  • All thru-hulls have been re-vaulved (August 2020)
  • New AV system and TVs including a new sound system with lighted speakers on bridge deck 
  • Updated bridge electronics
  • New carpet
  • Timeless styling
  • Floor to ceiling windows create endless ocean views in the formal dining, media room, main salon, and master stateroom

descriptions.title: Interior
descriptions.description:
• Headliners of ultra-suede, mirror, leather, and painted panels Incandescent overhead lighting
  • Lacquer finish walls
  • Window treatments in Duet blinds & Roman shades - main and aft salon
  • White marble in main foyer and bathrooms
  • Custom white carpet in main salon
  • Custom wool carpeting in staterooms
  • High gloss teak and holly aft salon sole
  • High gloss beach wood soles in galley and crew mess
  • All staterooms have ensuite bathrooms

descriptions.title: Main Deck
descriptions.description:
As you board, either the port or starboard entrance, you are welcomed into the foyer thru sliding glass doors into the main salon. The large main salon offers comfortable seating, a game table, and beautiful white carpeting. Aft of the main salon, there is an open entertaining area featuring a new full-service bar with white light-up onyx (starboard) with 3 barstools and 2 circular seating areas for casual dining for up to 12 guests. Floors are varnished teak and holly and there’s a new large TV port side. This area is also known as the breakfast room.

 

There are exit doors both port and starboard that lead to outside seating port aft. Here is where you access to the engine room through the watertight door and there is also access to the lower bathing platform which is covered with teak.

 

Once back inside and moving forward from the main salon, there are two identical guest bathrooms that mirror each other center, a media room that can convert to a 6th stateroom starboard and formal dining for 12 guests with direct access from the galley port.

 

The owner’s study and media room feature a comfortable couch that also doubles as a queen bed. The coffee table conveniently spits into two and can double as side tables when used as a stateroom. There is a new Samsung TV that is great to watch sports or a gaming area for children. There is a dresser for storage and a separate head, shower and closet for guests’ clothes or storage.

 

The Formal Dining area sits 12 guests comfortably for dining with easy access from the galley. There is a buffet stand for beverage and/or food staging when not enjoying 6 star dining. The room can be closed off for privacy and the view thru the large windows offers a nice touch while dining. Aft of the galley is a stewardess prep area for serving directly into the formal dining area.

 

Moving forward from the main solon is the commercial stainless-steel galley that offers great space for the finest chefs.  The crew mess is situated adjacent the galley (starboard) and offers a u-shaped settee.  There is a surveillance system for monitoring in this area.  Moving forward, is a walk-in laundry room with dual washer/dryer.

descriptions.title: Bridge Deck / Upper Deck
descriptions.description:
From the main salon, there is a spiral staircase that leads you to the bridge deck. From the top of the stairs, you can exit the yacht, starboard, or enter the owner’s suite aft. Like the main deck, you will enjoy plenty of natural light from the large, stylish windows. To your right is the entrance to “His” closet, shower, and head. Continuing aft from the starboard side you enter the spacious master suite with new white carpet and a king size bed that faces aft. When not enjoying the natural sunlight, there are black out shades for the windows. You will find the entrance to the large “Hers” bathroom, which is complete with a large jacuzzi tub, vanity and walk in closet with great space.

 

There is a private door from the master suite that exits from the starboard side out to the aft deck and the wide workaround decks. You will find a custom teak dining table with comfortable seating for 10 guests under the covered deck area.

 

Forward of the Owner’s Stateroom you will find the Captain’s office and bridge. Captain’s cabin is aft of the pilothouse on the port side. For easy access outside from the bridge, you will find sliding glass doors both port and starboard, accessing the side decks and wing stations

 

On the starboard side of the bridge, you will find a stairway down to the galley and crew mess. Tender storage is located both port and starboard and the launching crane is aft. Tender storage is perfect for two 19’ Novarania’s or two small jet boats. You can access the bow of the yacht from the wing stations.

descriptions.title: Sundeck
descriptions.description: There are two staircases leading up to the Sundeck from the bridge deck aft. This is a great area for sunning, entertaining or enjoying the 10 person Jacuzzi.  There is a small bar, with refrigerator, and a guest head with shower. A new sound system has been installed with speaker lights which add to an amazing ambiance. Moving forward you will find a circular seating area that allows great views while underway.  Aft on the sundeck features a great seating area and 4 teak sun loungers.

descriptions.title: Lower Deck
descriptions.description:
From the main salon, you walk down the beautiful spiral staircase with updated silver hand railing where you will find 4 guest staterooms, all en-suite. The staterooms are timeless with styling in a light in color design, lacquered furniture, mirrored wardrobes and televisions in each room.

 

The two forward cabins have king beds and Jacuzzi tubs with shower in the bathroom (The blue and pink staterooms).

 

Aft you will find 2 staterooms that mirror each other, both with a queen bed and a single bed that is adjacent. These rooms sleep up to 3 guests in each room (The gold and purple staterooms). The ensuite bathrooms have a shower, no tub.

descriptions.title: Crew Quarters
descriptions.description: Forward of the guest staterooms, you will find 4 crew cabins accommodating 9 crew, located on the lower deck forward (all refurbished in 2010) and a separate Captain's Cabin is located aft of the wheelhouse on the bridge deck.

descriptions.description:

  • New shaft seals, new SKF bearings installed

descriptions.title: Broker Comments
descriptions.description:
Offered for sale by her 3rd Owner, "SHE’S A 10" was designed by Jon Bannenberg and delivered by Oceanfast in December of 1989. "SHE’S A 10" has always received the best of care, maintenance and refits since new. She has had a substantial refit under the current ownership with a long list of updates including W-6’s on the wing engines, fresh hull paint in 2018, upgraded electronics, new sound system and televisions, new teak on the sundeck and the list goes on. 

 

Shallow, fast and quiet underway, "SHE’S A 10" can access many cruising grounds and ports normally off-limits to a 164’' yacht. "SHE’S A 10" represents an exceptional opportunity to own a top-quality, stylish motor yacht that is well known for her unique Bannenberg design and consistent top-level maintenance since new. She offers a rare combination of stunning looks, great speed, and efficient fuel consumption.

 

"SHE’S A 10" is currently undergoing current upgrades at Lauderdale Marine Center and is ready for inspection and purchase at any time.  Please bring all offers.

dealerListings.description: MARGARITA is part of the very popular Ocean Alexander 74 series of motor yachts. MARGARITA was built with all of the upgrades including but not limited to, dual bow anchors, bow and stern thruster, two full sets of washer and dryers, two water heaters and a waste treatment plant. With the 1500 HP MTU engines, MARGARITA effortlessly cruises through the seas. MARGARITA has always been well taken care of by its owner and is sure to impress.

descriptions.title: Walkthrough
descriptions.description:
Walkthrough
MARGARITA has a spacious three cabin layout accommodating six guests plus a separate crew cabin aft for two. Once aboard, the aft deck built in alfresco dining area is nicely equipped with a wet bar including refrigeration and an ice maker. Generous side decks along both sides of the cabin lead to the bow area outfitted with dual Marquipt lounge chairs.

You enter the main salon through automatic double stainless-steel doors off the aft deck. To starboard you will find a wet bar and a generous L-shaped sofa with built in storage. To port is the entertainment center with a large TV on a lift and two barrel chairs forward.

Moving forward up a step is the day head on the port side. To starboard is the large county kitchen nicely appointed with top of the line full sized appliances. Forward is the lower helm outfitted with electric Stidd chair, Furuno electronics and dual side doors leading to the side decks.  Along the port side of the helm area is a dining settee perfect for breakfast or soaking in the views.

The guest cabins are accessed via a stair case from the starboard side of the lower helm.  The guest cabin foyer has a nice built in cabinet for storage and a laundry center with separate washer and dryer. All three guest cabins feature en-suite heads with showers.  Forward is the VIP cabin with an island queen berth and cedar lined closets to port and starboard. Midship to port is the side by side twin cabin with a cedar lined closet. Moving aft, separated by the lower foyer and a few steps, the master cabin features a center line king berth and large built in chest of drawers along both sides of the cabin. On the port side of the bed is a large cedar lined walk in closet and starboard of the bed is a vanity with mirror. The nicely appointed master head has dual sinks, lots of storage and a generous shower. On the forward wall of the master cabin to port is an additional cedar lined closet and the entertainment center.

The flybridge is accessed up a stair case on the port side of the county kitchen. Forward, the helm is nicely outfitted with two Stidd chairs.  Aft, you will find two comfortable built in dining settees with tables and storage beneath. Just behind the port settee, the wet bar is complete with BBQ grille, refrigeration and an ice maker.  Just behind the bar you have the boat deck that can accommodate a large 15’ tender.

The crews quarters is accessed through a water tight door in the transom. Before entering the crews, quarters there is a nice lazarette space for extra storage or for water toys. Once in the crew’s quarters, to port is the crew cabin with two bunks the lower bunk is oversized and there is a nice desk along the forward bulk head of the cabin. To starboard is the head with shower. The crew mess features a microwave oven, refrigerator and a full laundry center.  Forward is the watertight door leading to the engine room.

dealerListings.description:
*Not available for sale to US residents while in US waters.

DRAKKAR is a 2002 Princess 61 Flybridge equipped with (2) MAN 800hp engines providing a cruising speed of 24 knots, with 30 knots top speed. The boat has been maintained by the Captain and used regularly by the owner, cruising with family and friends to Florida and the Bahamas.

descriptions.title: Detailed Information
descriptions.description:
*Not available for sale to US residents while in US waters.

Overview
DRAKKAR is now available for showing in North Miami.

DRAKKAR is a lovely 2002 Princess 61 Flybridge very well maintained by the current owner and his captain. Equipped with two MANs 8-cylinder, 800 HP diesel engines, can cruise at 24 knots, with 30 knots top speed. The boat has been Florida based under current ownership and has been used regularly cruising with family and friends in Florida and the Bahamas.

The standard outfit, finish and performance of Princess motor yachts rank them as one of the best luxury boats in the world. The Princess 61 is no exception. The boat is constructed to the highest standards to successfully handle tough conditions the ocean can sometimes dish out. Princess hulls are designed not only to outperform in terms of maximum speed but with safety and comfort, economically, over long distances and at high speeds.

DRAKKAR carries 744 gallons of fuel. At 20 knots her cruising range is 350 nautical miles. But when you do offshore passage, you’d normally only be pulling around 12 to 14 knots, that distance would be considerably greater.

DRAKKAR Key Features:
• Cruise 24 knots, WOT 30 knots, 350 nautical miles range at 20 knots
• AC system has been replaced and upgraded under current ownership
• One of the few 61 Princess with two generators on board. An 11KW and 21.5KW. The 11KW offers quite operation and is able to support AC load and services when at anchor. If more power is required the 21.5KW can take the lead.
• Both MANs engines were overhauled in Feb 2011 ($144,000 bill, record available) by previous owner and current owner bought this boat with virtually zero hours. He put around 450h since purchased.
• Comfortable dual helm seating on lower helm station and flybridge
• Large island beds in Master and VIP staterooms
• L-shaped passenger’s lounge and large sunpad
• Full Bimini Flybridge with on pedestal Edison Professional speaker offers a perfect area for entertainment
• Spacious engine room to carry out regular maintenance and servicing

Walkthrough
As far as layout goes, with her owner’s stateroom amidships, two further guest staterooms and an aft crews’ cabin, long stays onboard are relaxing and pleasant. The three spacious staterooms and their bathrooms incorporate separate shower stalls and vanity units. Island beds, hanging lockers, cherrywood joinery, the staterooms are luxurious to say the least.

Moving up onto the main level, a very spacious saloon and separate dining area is complemented by a large and well-equipped galley, with twin fridge freezers. A utility area and laundry complete this outstanding interior. The additional aft cabin is basically for the crew.

Furniture is finished in natural cherry wood complemented by inlaid marquetry and quartered grain, a signature of all Princess motor yachts. Brilliant sound system, television cabinet, beautiful soft leather upholstered lounges and a lower helm station of world-class proportions.

Driving from this lower helm station the Princess 61 maintains a level attitude at all speeds. The aft cockpit is expansive with the rear window of the saloon opening from the top so guests in the aft cockpit can converse freely with those in the saloon. A hatch in the cockpit floor opens to provide access to the large engine room.

Moving into the main saloon and up the stylish stairway, the wide-open flybridge is a delight. Dual helm seating, an unusual L-shaped passenger’s lounge and a massive sun pad make this another useful entertaining area. A full Bimini structure protect the flybridge area where most of the driving happens and the set-up here is ideal.

Construction
• Hull: Modified deep V with spray rails and propeller tunnels. Hand laid fiberglass construction with isophthalic gel coat backed by initial lay-up of powder bound and isophthalic resin
• Side Deck: GRP – with non-slip surface
• Superstructure: GRP white
• Cockpit/Bathing Platform: GRP - Teak laid decks

Accommodations
The three-cabin layout includes a lovely midships double cabin with ensuite head and shower, a forward double cabin also an ensuite, and to port is a comfortable twin cabin which also has its own head and shower. Two staircases to the flybridge are easy to use. Aft cabin fit out for crew or occasional guests.

Midships Master Stateroom
• Large double berth
• Twin bedside tables and lamps
• Storage all round
• Dressing table with a large mirror
• Hanging wardrobe and drawers
• Sony Radio / CD player with remote control
• En-suit head with wash basin and separate shower compartment

Forward Stateroom
• Large double bed
• Hanging locker
• Cupboards with shelves
• Opening portholes
• Ensuite includes washbasin, separate shower area with automatic pump-out, extractor fan, shaver point, electric head

Port Stateroom
• (2) Single berths convertible to a double
• Hanging lockers and shelves
• Individual berth lights
• Opening portholes
• Ensuite includes washbasin, separate shower with automatic pump-out, extractor fan and electric head

Salon
U-shaped sofa and coffee table to starboard, twin seating to port, discrete lighting, side windows allow plenty of natural light in. Overhead lights are incorporated into deck head. General entertainments center also to port includes a pop up Samsung LCD 43” TV and JVC DVD/CD surround sound system. Forward leads to the dinette area to port with seating for six guests. There is a 65 liter drink refrigerator as well. The internal staircase also leads up to the Flybridge. Aft door in stainless steel with dropping window section. There is also a window to Port which drops opposite the helm.

Furniture finished in natural High gloss Cherry, helm console finished with Nomex non reflective finish and Burr-elm panels. Stone leather upholstery. Espresso carpets. Cream carpets in cabins and heads finished with teak decking, cherry and cream with a fleck Avonite tops. External upholstery is white with navy piping and inserts.

Galley
To starboard the galley is found at a lower level to the salon. The Avonite worktop (in cream fleck finish) has large stainless sink and incorporated pot stands. Including a 4-burner electric hobs cooktop. Compact Splendide washer and dryer is above the work surface in the utility area.

• Oster combination oven & grill
• 4-Burner electric hob
• (2) 110v refrigerator 153 liter
• Set of Princess V&B china

Deck Equipment
• Reversible electric (2000 watt) Lewmar anchor winch with Capstan, foredeck and helm position controls
• 40kg Delta anchor and 100 m chain feeding through bow roller 
• Foredeck wash
• Foredeck locker
• Full set of IMCO navigation lights
• Stainless steel bow, stern and two spring cleats in pairs
• (3) Large pantograph windscreen wipers with freshwater wash
• Searchlight with remote control
• Electric horns
• Opacmare hydraulic davit with remote control
• Aft cockpit cover
• Foredeck sunbathing cushions
• Stern quarter capstan winches for mooring lines
• One side door from internal helm
• Swimming ladder of platform
• Flybridge Bimini white
• Bathing platform shower
• Flybridge speakers
• 65-Liter refrigerator on flybridge
• Wet bar/grill/BBQ on flybridge
• Helmsman’s side door
• Hot and cold transom shower

Navigation Electronics
At Internal Helm:
• Raymarine ST60 Speed
• Raymarine ST60 Depth
• Raymarine ST6001+ autopilot
• Furuno Navnet colour plotter / radar (24mile) / fish sonar (Large screen) with Navionics charts 
• Icom IC M602 VHF DSC
• Plastimo Helm compass

At Flybridge Helm:
• Raymarine ST60 Tridata, depth and speed
• Raymarine ST6001+ autopilot
• Garmin GPS MAP 4212 chart plotter / radar 
• Simrad RS87 VHF DSC
• Plastimo Helm compass

Mechanical Equipment
• Engines: 2x MAN D2848LE403, 8-cylinder V-configuration 800 HP diesel
• Both MANs engines were overhauled in Feb 2011 by previous owner and current owner bought this boat with virtually zero hours. He put around 450h since purchased.
• ZF gear boxes on a straight shaft drive
• Water lubricated stern glands
• Rudder angle indicator
• Consumption: 24 gallons/hour each engine approx (while cruising)
• Hydraulic power-assisted steering with adjustable wheels
• Single lever Mathers electronic engine controls with trolling facility
• Side power bow thruster
• Trim tabs
• Bilge audible alarm and warning lights
• (3) Electric bilge pumps, automatic
• Hand-held extinguishers in cabins, auto-extinguishers in engine room
• Engine room fans
• Automatic and manual bilge pump systems
• Five-bladed propellers
• Cruise air systems - Air conditioning/reverse cycle to all cabins
• Vacuflush quiet flush (electric)

Electrical Equipment
• Bank of 4 x 24 volt heavy duty batteries for engine starting
• Bank of 6 x 24 volt heavy duty batteries for domestic use
• Shore power system: 110 volts shore power supply to all cabins
• Polarity check system
• Circuit breakers on all circuits
• 12v dropper for certain navigation and radio circuits
• Onan Cummins 21.5Kw
• Onan Cummins 11 Kw
• (2) Engine alternators charge via blocking diodes to isolate engine start batteries from auxiliaries
• 24v 100 Ah Float battery charger

Water Systems
• Hot water production: 110-volt immersion and hot water calorifier
• Pressurized hot and cold-water system
• Water level gauge
• Deck filler

Tankage
• Fuel: 770 Gallons, 3,500 Litres, 4 Tanks
• Fuel cross over valve, (2) separate 2000 primary fuel filters per engine (4) in total
• Water: 166 gallons, 755 liters, (2) tanks including 16 gallons hot water
• Holding tank with sea and deck pump out (56 gallon)

dealerListings.description: NEVER ENOUGH (previously GALLANT LADY and KISMET) has been exceptionally well maintained and upgraded throughout her life. Major upgrades were done in 2015 to include new engines, new generators, all new air conditioning, new paint, new teak decks and new electronics. Additional upgrades listed in the specifications. NEVER ENOUGH represents an extremely well-built 5-stateroom yacht with exceptional volume throughout. Both her main saloon and skylounge are full width which makes for a massive interior breadth and allows ample seating and lounging. Her bridge deck aft and sundeck are excellent spaces for dining and outdoor entertainment. NEVER ENOUGH has all the amenities and a layout perfect for both private or charter use.

descriptions.title: Overview
descriptions.description:
NEVER ENOUGH represents an incredible opportunity to own one of the most iconic Feadships to ever cruise the South Florida waters.  Originally commissioned as GALLANT LADY and built for a repeat Feadship owner who had knowledge and expectations that were met in this build. The attention to detail is evident throughout the yacht, with high end materials such as mahogany woodwork and marble finishes. 

2016 saw the completion of a massive refit that included but not limited to new C32A Caterpillar engines, new generators, complete paint job, aft deck and swim platform extensions, new A/C chillers, new electronics and new teak.

Featuring 5-staterooms, she sleeps 10 guests in great comfort. The full-beam master with king berth, has his and hers ensuite on the main deck.  Below are 4 large guest staterooms with 2 being queen berths and 2 twins.  All staterooms have ample closet and storage, all with ensuite baths and entertainment systems. Total accommodations of 1 king, 2 queens and 2 sets of twins.

descriptions.title: Walkthrough
descriptions.description:
Boarding the boat via steps on the starboard side forward leads to the formal foyer entrance of the main salon. The popular path to enter the vessel is through the boarding step on either side aft or by passerelle to enter the large covered aft deck. Casual seating on the aft deck is perfect for gathering to watch all the water sports that will be staged on the large swim platform if stern to a floating dock or if one is reaching the boat by tender. You can also enter the aft deck from the swim platform by taking a step from port or starboard.

Entering the main saloon from the aft deck through the custom-built double glass sliding doors, you will find an elegant and stylish lounge for entertaining guests. The entertaining bar to port is equipped with all the bar amenities one could need. The seating area includes large custom sofas, multiple chairs, high/low coffee tables, as well as a game table.

The main saloon has a spacious and open feel to it with great visibility through large windows port and starboard. The spacious formal dining area is one of three places to dine aboard. It features a custom rectangular dining table capable of seating ten guests, with plenty of natural light through the large side windows. There is ample storage to port for storing china, crystal and stemware. An automatic door to port acts as a service entrance between the galley and dining salon.

The large professional galley is located forward to port of the dining salon with access from the midship port side deck for ease of crew access and stocking galley supplies. As you enter the butler's pantry from the dining area, you will find an ice machine and dishwasher. All appliances in the galley are stainless steel units including 2 large side-by-side True refrigerators, steamer oven, dishwashers, 2-drawer freezer, cooktop and 2 double wall ovens and a microwave.

Going forward to starboard on the main deck is the on-deck powder room. Once entering the on-deck Master Suite, you will find a settee to starboard, king size berth with bedside table, and built-in deck to port forward. There is ample storage and closet space. The large ensuite is his and hers with shower and tub. The master includes a 50” TV.

Descending the starboard main foyer stairwell to the lower foyer, there is access to four large guest staterooms. Two mirror image staterooms feature queen size beds, ensuite both have shower/tub combo and ample storage and hanging space in the closet. There are also mirror twin cabins with two twin berths in both cabins and ensuites with shower/tub combo.

Moving up the winding stairs from the guest foyer up two levels, passing the main deck to the bridge deck lies the bridge deck dining room. Moving aft you pass a well-appointed bridge deck powder room, continuing aft you enter the expansive skylounge with a very large dining table. Continue walking aft through a set of glass double doors leads to the third dining area on the spacious upper aft deck, featuring a custom teak table accommodating ten guests. Forward on this deck is the spacious pilothouse, with a leather settee with table for guests to enjoy the view without disturbing the captain. A large captains office with navigation work desk, chart table and drawers is aft and to starboard. 3 captain's chairs and plenty of storage are included in the bridge. The bridge wings feature docking stations port & starboard. Via Portuguese bridge access over a central catwalk in the deckhouse leads to the working foredeck which houses two Wave Runners.

Access to the Sundeck from the bridge deck aft is up a set of stairs centerline. The spacious deck includes a large jacuzzi, full bar set up, ample lounge areas and a full helm station. On the aft part of the sundeck are several comfortable lounge chairs.

descriptions.title: Broker Comments
descriptions.description: NEVER ENOUGH (previously GALLANT LADY and KISMET) has been exceptionally well maintained and upgraded throughout her life. Major upgrades were done in 2015 to include new engines, new generators, all new air conditioning, new paint, new teak decks and new electronics. Additional upgrades listed in the specifications. NEVER ENOUGH represents an extremely well-built 5-stateroom yacht with exceptional volume throughout. Both her main saloon and skylounge are full width which makes for a massive interior breadth and allows ample seating and lounging. Her bridge deck aft and sundeck are excellent spaces for dining and outdoor entertainment. NEVER ENOUGH has all the amenities and a layout perfect for both private or charter use.

This vessel is offered subject to prior sale, price change, or withdrawal without notice.

dealerListings.description:
Timeless, elegant, stylish and set up for entertaining, SHE’S A 10 is ready for her next owner to enjoy. Originally designed by Jon Bannenberg and Phil Curran, this 1989 164’ (49.9m) Oceanfast offers speed up to 30 knots at light load, agility and a shallow draft of 5’ 3” which is perfect for the Bahamas or other international cruising grounds. Sleeping 12 guests in 5 staterooms, the master is on the bridge deck with the 4 guest staterooms below. There is a media room on the main deck that can also convert into a 6th stateroom with shower and closet and storage.

Previously known as Mystique, SHE’S A 10 has only had 3 owners and shows well. With recent fresh hull paint, W-6’s on the engines and endless upgrades.

descriptions.title: Overview
descriptions.description:
Timeless, elegant, stylish and set up for entertaining, SHE’S A 10 is ready for her next owner to enjoy.  Originally designed by Jon Bannenberg and Phil Curran, this 1989 164’ (49.9m) Oceanfast offers speed up to 30 knots at light load, agility and a shallow draft of 5’ 3” which is perfect for the Bahamas or other international cruising grounds. Sleeping 12 guests in 5 staterooms, the master is on the bridge deck with the 4 guest staterooms below. There is a media room on the main deck that can also convert into a 6th stateroom with shower and closet and storage.

 

Previously known as Mystique, SHE’S A 10 has only had 3 owners and shows well. With recent fresh hull paint, W-6’s on the engines and endless upgrades, you can find a detailed list of updates below.

 

Key Features

  • Fast, shallow draft yacht with 3 x engines and 3 x KaMeWa waterjets
  • Open interior plan
  • W-6 on port engine (August 2020)
  • W-5 on starboard engine (August 2020)
  • Port engine 3 year / 3000-hour warranty begins November 2020
  • Generators being serviced (Sept 2020)
  • Jacuzzi on flybridge
  • Master on the bridge deck with private entrance to outside
  • Able to convert the media room on the main deck into a 6th ensuite stateroom
  • New hull paint in 2018
  • Ceramic coating on superstructure (January 2020)
  • All thru-hulls have been re-vaulved (August 2020)
  • New AV system and TVs including a new sound system with lighted speakers on bridge deck 
  • Updated bridge electronics
  • New carpet
  • Timeless styling
  • Floor to ceiling windows create endless ocean views in the formal dining, media room, main salon, and master stateroom

descriptions.title: Interior
descriptions.description:
• Headliners of ultra-suede, mirror, leather, and painted panels Incandescent overhead lighting
  • Lacquer finish walls
  • Window treatments in Duet blinds & Roman shades - main and aft salon
  • White marble in main foyer and bathrooms
  • Custom white carpet in main salon
  • Custom wool carpeting in staterooms
  • High gloss teak and holly aft salon sole
  • High gloss beach wood soles in galley and crew mess
  • All staterooms have ensuite bathrooms

descriptions.title: Main Deck
descriptions.description:
As you board, either the port or starboard entrance, you are welcomed into the foyer thru sliding glass doors into the main salon. The large main salon offers comfortable seating, a game table, and beautiful white carpeting. Aft of the main salon, there is an open entertaining area featuring a new full-service bar with white light-up onyx (starboard) with 3 barstools and 2 circular seating areas for casual dining for up to 12 guests. Floors are varnished teak and holly and there’s a new large TV port side. This area is also known as the breakfast room.

 

There are exit doors both port and starboard that lead to outside seating port aft. Here is where you access to the engine room through the watertight door and there is also access to the lower bathing platform which is covered with teak.

 

Once back inside and moving forward from the main salon, there are two identical guest bathrooms that mirror each other center, a media room that can convert to a 6th stateroom starboard and formal dining for 12 guests with direct access from the galley port.

 

The owner’s study and media room feature a comfortable couch that also doubles as a queen bed. The coffee table conveniently spits into two and can double as side tables when used as a stateroom. There is a new Samsung TV that is great to watch sports or a gaming area for children. There is a dresser for storage and a separate head, shower and closet for guests’ clothes or storage.

 

The Formal Dining area sits 12 guests comfortably for dining with easy access from the galley. There is a buffet stand for beverage and/or food staging when not enjoying 6 star dining. The room can be closed off for privacy and the view thru the large windows offers a nice touch while dining. Aft of the galley is a stewardess prep area for serving directly into the formal dining area.

 

Moving forward from the main solon is the commercial stainless-steel galley that offers great space for the finest chefs.  The crew mess is situated adjacent the galley (starboard) and offers a u-shaped settee.  There is a surveillance system for monitoring in this area.  Moving forward, is a walk-in laundry room with dual washer/dryer.

descriptions.title: Bridge Deck / Upper Deck
descriptions.description:
From the main salon, there is a spiral staircase that leads you to the bridge deck. From the top of the stairs, you can exit the yacht, starboard, or enter the owner’s suite aft. Like the main deck, you will enjoy plenty of natural light from the large, stylish windows. To your right is the entrance to “His” closet, shower, and head. Continuing aft from the starboard side you enter the spacious master suite with new white carpet and a king size bed that faces aft. When not enjoying the natural sunlight, there are black out shades for the windows. You will find the entrance to the large “Hers” bathroom, which is complete with a large jacuzzi tub, vanity and walk in closet with great space.

 

There is a private door from the master suite that exits from the starboard side out to the aft deck and the wide workaround decks. You will find a custom teak dining table with comfortable seating for 10 guests under the covered deck area.

 

Forward of the Owner’s Stateroom you will find the Captain’s office and bridge. Captain’s cabin is aft of the pilothouse on the port side. For easy access outside from the bridge, you will find sliding glass doors both port and starboard, accessing the side decks and wing stations

 

On the starboard side of the bridge, you will find a stairway down to the galley and crew mess. Tender storage is located both port and starboard and the launching crane is aft. Tender storage is perfect for two 19’ Novarania’s or two small jet boats. You can access the bow of the yacht from the wing stations.

descriptions.title: Sundeck
descriptions.description: There are two staircases leading up to the Sundeck from the bridge deck aft. This is a great area for sunning, entertaining or enjoying the 10 person Jacuzzi.  There is a small bar, with refrigerator, and a guest head with shower. A new sound system has been installed with speaker lights which add to an amazing ambiance. Moving forward you will find a circular seating area that allows great views while underway.  Aft on the sundeck features a great seating area and 4 teak sun loungers.

descriptions.title: Lower Deck
descriptions.description:
From the main salon, you walk down the beautiful spiral staircase with updated silver hand railing where you will find 4 guest staterooms, all en-suite. The staterooms are timeless with styling in a light in color design, lacquered furniture, mirrored wardrobes and televisions in each room.

 

The two forward cabins have king beds and Jacuzzi tubs with shower in the bathroom (The blue and pink staterooms).

 

Aft you will find 2 staterooms that mirror each other, both with a queen bed and a single bed that is adjacent. These rooms sleep up to 3 guests in each room (The gold and purple staterooms). The ensuite bathrooms have a shower, no tub.

descriptions.title: Crew Quarters
descriptions.description: Forward of the guest staterooms, you will find 4 crew cabins accommodating 9 crew, located on the lower deck forward (all refurbished in 2010) and a separate Captain's Cabin is located aft of the wheelhouse on the bridge deck.

descriptions.title: 2013 Refit Overview
descriptions.description:
• Haul out, sand blast of bottom to bare metal, new coats of antifouling applied
  • All three Kamewa jet units removed and serviced at the Rolls Royce facility in Miramar, FL
  • Re-installation of the jets, sea trials to follow once back in the water; Recommended service on the jets is every 3 years or 10,000 hours
  • New shaft seals, new SKF bearings installed
  • Alignment to be completed once in the water by AME (AME replaced all engine and gearbox mounts in 2012)
  • Escogear flexible gear couplers serviced on all three engines
  • Oil and filter changes completed on main engines and generators
  • Major pipe work and valve replacement completed in the engine room
  • Sea chests removed and weld repaired
  • Day tanks cleaned
  • Exhaust leaks repaired on all three main engines
  • Service to the A/C chillers in the engine room
  • New fresh air makeup units installed, and chilled water lines run to the foredeck area
  • Service on interior air handlers by Matthews Marine
  • Service on the stabilizers completed by Quantum– sea trial to follow once back in the water
  • Bow thruster gears rebuilt and installed by ABS Marine Hydraulics; all valves and hoses replaced on the hydraulics
  • Foredeck crane removed, serviced, and re-installed by UMT; this is the crane used for the wave runners
  • Replaced frequency drives on the EVAC system and bow thruster units – GBR Marine
  • Watermakers serviced by Watermaker Tec
  • Rebuild of the fuel transfer pump, DC air compressor, EVAC pump
  • Replaced all the emergency backup batteries in the engine room with new
  • Serviced and cleaned ATLAS unit – GBR Marine
  • All bridge electronics serviced and repaired as necessary, new sphere purchased for the GYRO
  • Updated chart plotter, new monitor purchased in wheelhouse
  • Removed searchlight on mast and repaired
  • 2 x Novurania custom tenders serviced, and warranty items repaired by Novurania
  • All new interior guest and crew carpets purchased and installed
  • AV upgrade in guest areas, new Samsung tv's, Blu ray players, Wifi throughout the vessel
  • Aft salon, main salon, wheelhouse and sun deck bathroom teak floors all varnished (Wheelhouse and sun deck floors were stopped then-new varnish applied)
  • Blinds replaced in the main salon, aft salon and captain cabin with new fabric
  • Windows removed and calked in the main and aft salon
  • All interior doors removed (20 doors), painted white to match interior spaces
  • Carpentry modifications to the lower guest cabins; old tv stand removed from foot of beds, vanities removed, and new cabinets installed
  • Removed the swivel tv in the aft salon, replaced the teak in some areas 
  • Installed a new cabinet on the port side where the seating used to be – aft salon
  • Removed the glass doors to the aft salon, replaced the track with teak threshold
  • All gold-plated door handles, knobs, stairwell rails re-coated by RH Plating throughout
  • New dryers purchased for the laundry room
  • New washers were purchased in 2011
  • Crew escape hatch pneumatics replaced and repaired
  • All safety gear updated, serviced for annual survey for Marshall Islands (includes lifesaving, firefighting, medical etc.)
  • Canvas repairs to exterior, new childproof netting for all three decks fabricated
  • Service to all dive tanks, compressor completed
  • New dive gear, BCD'S & regulators to be purchased at the end of the yard period
  • Polished anchor pockets, anchors; chain painted
  • Anchor windlass serviced, new check valves installed, hoses replaced by MCT
  • Sun deck teak routed, calked, and sanded; main deck teak will be sanded; bridge deck teak in good shape
  • Exterior overheads on the bridge deck and main deck painted by Joe V's. Swim platform area painted; all non-skid on the foredeck painted; scratches on the hull painted; blisters around the anchor pockets repaired and painted

descriptions.title: Broker Comments
descriptions.description:
Offered for sale by her 3rd Owner, "SHE’S A 10" was designed by Jon Bannenberg and delivered by Oceanfast in December of 1989. "SHE’S A 10" has always received the best of care, maintenance and refits since new. She has had a substantial refit under the current ownership with a long list of updates including W-6’s on the wing engines, fresh hull paint in 2018, upgraded electronics, new sound system and televisions, new teak on the sundeck and the list goes on. 

 

Shallow, fast and quiet underway, "SHE’S A 10" can access many cruising grounds and ports normally off-limits to a 164’' yacht. "SHE’S A 10" represents an exceptional opportunity to own a top-quality, stylish motor yacht that is well known for her unique Bannenberg design and consistent top-level maintenance since new. She offers a rare combination of stunning looks, great speed, and efficient fuel consumption.

 

"SHE’S A 10" is currently undergoing current upgrades at Lauderdale Marine Center and is ready for inspection and purchase at any time.  Please bring all offers.

description:
This is a rare opportunity to have a very large boat, that is ready to remodel.  Has been in freshwater since 2008.  She was originally setup for gambling trips and most recently was being remodeled for restaurant service.  The project lapsed and the owner is ready to sell.  
Current State: Her Certificate of Inspection has expired.  She is documented as a "Recreational". So to bring back to commercial service in the USA, she has to be brought up to current inspected vessel USCG requirements.  Many uses of the boat under recreational, build out into a yacht, fractional ownership, VRBO at the dock, restaurant, etc...
In 2008-9, she was in tip-top condition.  It was driven to its current dock and laid up ever since.  She will need the following to get started: Batteries, mechanic to start since sitting for 11 yrs, port transmission rebuild, fuel polished, new shifter controls at helm, and other miscellaneous items.  She has just been sitting.  Time for a new owner to bring back to life.

Call for details.

dealerListings.description:
M/Y ?Tranquility? is a 1985 70 Cockpit Motor Yacht that is located on the Tennessee River. She was originally a 61? MY and in 1989 Cable Marine added the cockpit and swim platform. This adds so much to this model. You get the livability of Yacht with today?s wants and features. The obvious feature is to dive, fish, swim, off the stern; along with walk on and off the boat with no steps. Most of these boats are hard to enter and exit, but with the cockpit, no problem. The cockpit also adds additional fuel and higher cruising speed and efficiency. She has four staterooms including a King bed in the Master stateroom and 4 heads, full size washer/dryer, huge galley and dinette, Upper and Lower Helms, aft deck, dingy, and 1670 gallons in fuel capacity; this vessel is ready to travel in comfort. New Listing call Patrick for more details.

description:
The PRIME Megayacht Platform  I  The Future of Semi-Custom has arrived

At PRIME, our belief is that those who invest time and energy into building a megayacht should be rewarded with a creation which represents his or her distinctive style.

Much like a custom home builder, PRIME offers you the sophistication of a custom build with the time- and cost-savings benefits of a semi-production series. Choose from The Collection (CALOU, DREAM, NEXT, PRISMA) or take advantage of PRIME’s flexibility to create your own masterpiece.

Create with Confidence, while benefitting from a thoroughly engineered platform designed by an elite team of naval architects, master builders and interior designers.
title: The Future of Semi-Custom

descriptions.title: Specifications
descriptions.description:
Boat Type:   Displacement Motor Yacht

Builder: Bloemsma (The Netherlands) or Burger Boat Company (USA)

Naval Architecture & Engineering: Azure Naval Architecture & Yacht Design

Exterior Design : Reymond Langton Design

Interior Design:  At the Buyer’s discretion

 

LOA: 49.44m (162ft)

Beam: 8.80m (28.9ft)

Draft, Fully Loaded: 2.15m (7.1ft)

Displacement: 390 Metric Tons

Hull & Superstructure: Aluminum

 

Power: 2x MTU 8V 2000 M72

Max Speed: 16 knots

Cruise Speed: 13 knots

Range at Cruise: +/- 4,000 nm

Fuel Capacity: 50,000 L

Fresh Water Capacity: 12,000 L

Gross Tonnage: <500GT

 

Guest Accommodations: standard 5 cabins, 10 guests

Crew Accommodations:  5 cabins, 10 crew

descriptions.title: The Collection
descriptions.description:
The world’s Top Designers are invited to create design masterpieces utilizing the PRIME Megayacht Platform. These limited series designs compromise what we call The Collection.

Reymond Langton Design was established in 2001 by the talented design duo of Pascale Reymond and Andrew Langton, both of whom already had over a decade’s experience in the superyacht industry.

CALOU by Reymond Langton Design

"CALOU is designed with long, elegant flowing lines creating a clean, sharp profile. The surfaces of the yacht are dramatically sculpted, giving beautiful form with softly grading shadows contrasting with sharp contours.”  – Andrew Langton

descriptions.title: Resort Yacht Experience
descriptions.description: CALOU is the Resort Yacht Experience. CALOU offers multiple entertainment areas to be enjoyed day or night, at rest or underway. All guest areas, interior and exterior, are fully accessible to everyone, without the need for stairs. Outdoor entertaining is further enhanced by flexible furniture arrangements, to accommodate larger groups or intimate gatherings.

descriptions.title: Accommodations
descriptions.description:
The Owner’s Suite is ideally situated in the most comfortable location on the yacht, and has direct access to the Beach Club & Spa. In fact, the Owner’s Stateroom and the four (4) double Guest Staterooms all have a direct, same-level corridor straight through the Beach Club & Day Spa to the large swim platform.

By placing both the Owner and Guest Staterooms on the Guest Deck, the PRIME Team created a forward-facing Sky Lounge on the Main Deck, further enhancing her megayacht look and feel.

And to create a dedicated leisure zone on the Foredeck, the Team repurposed the yachts’ forward tender garage for use as a large 7.7-meter long swimming pool. Furthermore, all mooring equipment was hidden under the Main Deck, and a glass bulwark was placed all around, creating a spacious, wind-free outdoor lounging experience.

descriptions.title: Sky Lounge
descriptions.description:
Featuring massive, forward facing windows, the Sky Lounge has direct access to the foredeck entertaining area.

Virtually all luxury areas above the Main Deck are surrounded by full-height glass, creating bright interiors and spectacular panoramic views. The open-plan layout in the main Salon and Dining Area further enhances this full panorama experience.

With the main Lounge facing the stern, and the Sky Lounge facing the bow, CALOU provides her guests with 360° views from all luxury areas at any time. The Sky Lounge not only acts as the perfect area from which to keep an eye on children playing in the pool, it is also a great place to relax and enjoy the view while cruising to  the next exotic destination.

descriptions.title: Beach Club and Spa
descriptions.description:
CALOU’s spacious Beach Club & Spa opens up to the surroundings via a stern hatch and portside beach platform. It boasts a flushmounted hot tub for up to five (5) guests, a steam room, sauna, shower, gym, balcony, and an-all glass stern door. In a word … spectacular! 

The Beach Club & Spa is easily accessible while on the lower deck. From all guest staterooms there is a direct, same-level corridor leading straight to the Beach Club and to the large swim platform, perfect for an early morning swim in the ocean.

descriptions.title: Wheelhouse
descriptions.description:
The Wheelhouse and Captain’s Cabin features a dedicated staircase with direct access to the Main Deck.

Navigation Equipment:

• Radar installation : 2x Furuno

• Autopilot : 1x C. Plath

• AIS : 1x Furuno

• GPS : 2x Furuno

• Speed log : 1x Furuno

• Depth sounder : 1x Furuno

• Wind instruments : 1x Furuno

• Plotter : 1x Transas

• Magnetic compass : 2x C. Plath

• Gyro compass : 2x C. Plath

Communication Equipment:

• VHF : 2x Sailor

• Navtex : 1x Furuno

• Inmarsat C / LRIT : 1x Sailor

• Fleet 77 : 1x Nera

• PABX : 1x Panasonic

• GSM : 1x Sagem Dr. Neuhaus

Wheelhouse features: 

  • Wheelhouse front: The construction of the Wheelhouse front window area will have narrow mullions.
  • Demisting Wheelhouse: A demisting system will be installed in the Wheelhouse, through grills beneath the Wheelhouse four (4) front windows.
  • Propulsion controls: On the outside steering positions, remote or fixed, start/stop/stand-by controls, gas levers and rpm gauges will be mounted.
  • Audio and Video Equipment: Two (2) speakers plus docking station for operating panel or integrated panel.

descriptions.title: Engine Room
descriptions.description: Close collaboration between the PRIME founders and Azure’s design & engineering team resulted in the redistribution of space on CALOU to house the propulsion system in the Tank Deck. With said Deck now resembling the engine room layout of large sailing yachts, a tremendous amount of luxury space was opened up on the Guest Deck. In essence, a 70+ meter yachting experience was created on a 50 meter yacht.

descriptions.title: Remarks
descriptions.description: CALOU offers a wide variety of entertainment areas to be enjoyed day or night, at rest or underway. All guest areas, both interior and exterior, are fully accessible to all owners and guests, regardless of age and without the need for stairs. Outdoor entertaining is further enhanced by flexible furniture arrangements, to accommodate large groups or small intimate gatherings.

dealerListings.description:
WINNER: 2020's Best New Series by Boat International

LeVen 90 Flybridge 2021

LeVen 90, the Ultimate Exumas Superyacht. 2020's Best New Series, Dutch built & engineered, and loaded with groundbreaking tech. 

Navigate the shallows with a class-leading 4.5' draft, and access those impossible-to-reach exotic beaches in superyacht comfort. Let time slip away while soaking in the sun. Let the ocean become your personal playground. LeVen is luxury island living.

Starting from $8.4M with only a 16-month build time. Personalize to your unique tastes.
dealerListings.title: The Ultimate Exumas Superyacht

descriptions.title: Inspiration:
descriptions.description: From the Dutch word “leven”, which means both “life” and “to live,” LeVen Yachts celebrates the Exumas cruising lifestyle. The inspiration for YachtCreators and Lucas Silva in developing LeVen was yachting families who enjoy active, outdoor living in casual elegance.

descriptions.title: Purpose:
descriptions.description: YachtCreators assembled a Dutch dream team for LeVen; specifically, to create the ultimate superyacht for yachting families like the Silvas, ones with genuine passion for cruising Bahamian waters. Furthermore, a superyacht with the requisite speed, comfort, range and seaworthiness to take-on the often unpredictable sea conditions encountered between islands.

descriptions.title: Notable Options:
descriptions.description:
The MSRP listed for hull #2 includes the following upgrades over the base boat:

  • Hardtop, aluminum
  • Seakeeper gyro stabilization
  • Underwater lights
  • Engine upgrade to MTU 12V2000 M93

descriptions.title: Personalization:
descriptions.description:
• Class selection (e.g. RINA pleasure class) 
  • Solar package
  • Skylounge
  • Hull color
  • Other options available

descriptions.title: Voith Linear Jet Propulsion:
descriptions.description: For LeVen, YachtCreators ingeniously proposed something never before seen in the yachting industry … the Voith linear jet propulsion system. Indeed, LeVen is the first yacht in the world to take advantage of the Voith linear jet propulsion system. The Voith system not only solved the shallow draft specification, it also provides low noise & vibration levels as well.

descriptions.title: Slide Hull Design:
descriptions.description:
Internationally acclaimed for outside-the-box thinking, Vripack proposed their patented hard chine Slide Hull design for LeVen … their largest to date, in fact.

The Slide Hull directs water flow in a way that resembles going down a slide. Compared to a planing hull, the design affords LeVen certain key advantages, such as: improved ride quality, reduced pounding, and no bow rise as the yacht gets up on plane. This, combined with twin MTU 12V2000 engines, gives LeVen the ability to reach speeds in excess of 26 knots.

descriptions.title: Dutch DNA:
descriptions.description: The final phase for YachtCreators was to select a proper shipyard … one with the pedigree and stability worthy of LeVen, and with the flexibility to successfully manage the wealth of new technology. That shipyard is Van der Valk. With their rich history of premium custom builds, remarkable client retention rate, and infectious enthusiasm, Van der Valk is the perfect fit for LeVen.

descriptions.title: Great Room at Sea:
descriptions.description:
Taking a cue from luxury beach home designs, LeVen’s main deck is open, bright, and features a massive Chef’s Table-style galley forward. In essence a Great Room at sea, the main deck is ideally suited for entertaining friends and family, and the perfect venue for guests to gather, socialize, etc. while enjoying 360-degree ocean views. 

 “LeVen is for yachting families who crave connection with nature,” says YachtCreators founder Barin Cardenas, “without sacrificing luxury comforts and amenities at sea.”

LeVen’s side windows are enormous, as is the front windshield. Courtesy of a cleverly designed mechanism, the windshield opens to allow cool Bahamian breezes to flow uninterrupted from the galley to the aft dining deck, further highlighting the bright living space and sense of connection with nature onboard.

descriptions.title: Dining Deck:
descriptions.description:
Dining onboard LeVen is extraordinary, as the dining area claims an entire deck… a feature normally found only on 40-meter+  yachts. Moreover, the dining deck serves as an extension to both the galley and salon, thus completing the Great Room effect.

The open general arrangement philosophy continues aft, with an innovative lanai deck designed to host guests in a comfortable lounge-style setting before or after dinner.

descriptions.title: Sports Deck:
descriptions.description: Lastly, the expansive sports deck…named for its massive hidden storage trunk, which stores everything from scuba gear to stand-up paddle boards. This, along with the versatile forward and flybridge decks, empowers guests onboard LeVen to thoroughly enjoy both ocean and sun, from sunbathing to spearfishing, to jet skiing and more.

descriptions.title: End Result:
descriptions.description: LeVen is a tough-yet-luxurious, RINA-classed, Dutch-engineered & manufactured superyacht built entirely in renewable aluminum. She’s capable of speeds in excess of 26kts, has a range at cruise of over 400nm, and a class-leading draft of only 1.37m (4’6”).

descriptions.title: About YachtCreators:
descriptions.description: We create and yachts and yacht brands. With 60+ new builds to date, YachtCreators has garnered critical acclaim & success with award-winning builds, such as the 55-meter Laurentia by Heesen and the 38-meter NONO by Admiral, and with numerous covers and columns in The Superyacht Report and Boat International. In the process, we forged solid, lasting relationships with elite builders, renowned designers and visionary architects from around the world. Learn what it means to DREAM BUILD PLAY with YachtCreators today.

media.title: LeVen 90
media.description: Wide open spaces, amazing heights, and a genuinely connected main deck.

dealerListings.description:
2017 Horizon PC52 Power Catamaran

Take a Horizon PC52, already one of the most popular power cat models in the world, and combine it with the detailed eye of a highly experienced yachtsman and prestige car collector. The result? A stunning engine room, tasteful decor, and a yacht that is truly ready to let you enjoy the best of the islands these holidays and beyond.

This 2017 Horizon PC52 was surveyed this summer. Every item from the bottom paint to the window snaps has been addressed by an owner that likes to see his reflection in the engine room valve covers. This is the type of yacht you want to purchase in the brokerage market. Better than new in price, and fully outfitted to be enjoyed right away.

After spending nearly a decade in the BVI on a monohull, the owner of this 2017 Horizon PC52 wanted badly to enjoy a powercat. His plans have suddenly changed and now it’s your opportunity to live the dream.
dealerListings.title: New to the market

descriptions.title: Overview:
descriptions.description:
This 2017 Horizon PC52 is truly cruise-ready! 

 

August/Sept 2020: 

REFRESH: Full generator rebuild from the zincs to the exhaust manifolds, full engine service including new raw water pumps, watermaker serviced, windlass & chain markers, showroom-level exterior polish & wax.

NEW: Brand new flybridge Eisenglass with easy-to-open zippers (!!), new canvas throughout, all new exterior cushions, and brand new salon sofa cushions … beautiful and functional.

Topping out at 22kts and cruising at 18kts, the Horizon PC52 benefits from it’s high bridge clearance to offer a dry, comfortable and stable ride. Ample views, wide side decks, and a handy Yacht Controller makes this an excellent choice for owner-operators.

Family and friends will appreciate the generous 3 stateroom layout and multiple entertainment areas from the ample aft deck dining table to the bow sun pads.

The salon offers a Great Room experience with a fully stocked galley to stbd featuring Corian countertops, a full height stainless steel refrigerator, oven, dishwasher, and a proper overhang for stools… you won’t be cooking alone.

Under the forward windows is a spacious salon featuring all brand new cushions, a pop-up television and Sonos music controlled from your phone.

The flybridge on this 2017 Horizon PC52 holds a 13’ AB tender with a 60hp Yamaha outboard, a davit and bbq space. The helm lounge is fully enclosed with brand new Eisenglass and … air conditioning! Here you will find a comfortable lounge to port and a high-boy table to stbd with stools for sunset margaritas.

Twin Cummins QSB 6.7 engines pump out over 1,000hp combined to easily propel her to a comfortable 18kts cruise while 975 gals of fuel give you the range to explore. Garmin nav equipment package with large 7616 screens make plotting your trips easy.

descriptions.title: Recent Upgrades:
descriptions.description:
Generator:

The generator was stripped down and the following items were replaced on 9/15/20: 

  • Engine block flushed and new coolant installed

  • Cooler zinc replaced

  • Raw water pump replaced 9/15/20
  • All hoses and clamps replaced
  • Values adjusted

  • Transmission fluid changed
  • New engine thermostat replaced

  • New turbo hose replaced

  • Engine was replaced, under warranty by Cummins

Miscellaneous:

descriptions.title: Hull and Deck Notables:
descriptions.description:
• One-piece hull lamination and longitudinal girders
  • Hull was built with SCRIMP™ process for improved strength and less weight
  • High density foam cored construction bottom and topsides
  • Solid fiberglass laminate stem, keel
  • Main engine girders with high density foam coring

dealerListings.description:
2016 Azimut 50 Flybridge M/Y Fortunato

Inspired by the world of megayachts, the Azimut 50 Flybridge, with a 183 sq ft cockpit, is one of the largest yachts in her class. Fortunato, a 2016 model, is the perfect yacht for weekend excursions with the family, courtesy of the yacht’s superior ride and ample storage. 

The spacious interior accommodates guests comfortably in three cabins plus crew. The salon and dining area are guaranteed relaxation zones. A separate, independent galley is below deck and conveniently leads to the cabins.  

Fortunato is easy to preview at Turnberry Marina in Aventura, FL.

** Trade-ins considered, financing options available.

salesRep.salesMessage: The ocean is my passion and my goal is to make sure our clients enjoy every day out in the water with comfort and safety. Every day at sea must be a long lasting memory.

dealerListings.description:
THE BEACH SIDE OF LIFE

Van der Valk proudly introduces the truly innovative, patent pending BeachClub 660 Flybridge.

By ingeniously locating the Volvo IPS system in the same area as the swim platform, an extraordinary amount of exterior and interior space is freed up onboard!

As a result, the BeachClub 660 Flybridge boasts the same amount of space typically found on yachts of much larger size.
dealerListings.title: Sexy 60/66 BeachClub Series

descriptions.title: Concept
descriptions.description:
The Van der Valk BeachClub 660 Flybridge was developed in partnership with designer Cor D. Rover and Ginton Naval Architects. The ultimate aim for all was to greatly optimize both interior and exterior space onboard.

The BeachClub 660 Flybridge was built to the highest standards of Dutch quality and detail.

descriptions.title: Al Fresco LifeStyle
descriptions.description:
The BeachClub 660 Flybridge features three (3) main outdoor areas to enjoy the “al fresco lifestyle”:

• An enormous foredeck area offers various layout options, including a Jacuzzi.

• The cockpit deck is an impressive location, and includes an exterior steering station.

• The beach club aft features a smart swim platform, and a sun lounge area.

descriptions.title: Light and Bright
descriptions.description:
The overall spacious ambience is enhanced by generous use of glass throughout, with panoramic views from the two lounges and the owner’s suite. There are also numerous glass inserts in the hull, giving an additional air of class to an exterior profile which exudes modern elegance.

The BeachClub 660 Flybridge features two (2) salons. The spacious upper lounge has an inside steering position and panoramic views, while the huge lower deck lounge includes a galley and dining area, all with direct access to the swim platform via curved glass sliding doors.

descriptions.title: Complete Specs and Equipment
descriptions.description: The following sections provide highlights of the BeachClub 660 Flybridge’s specifications and equipment. For complete details on the 660 Flybridge, contact YachtCreators today at hello@yachtcreators.com.

description:
Maharani by PRIME Megayacht Platform

The 50-meter “Human-Centered” Design

PRIME, a pre-engineered 50-meter platform designed to support a variety of superstructures, and Maharani, a paradigm-shifting layout fully designed by Vripack “human-centered” living.

Maharani is a total reimagination of space, placing the Owner’s onboard experience at the center of it all. The galley, engine room and wheelhouse were relocated to areas more strategic for the Owner(s) and crew. New entertainment areas were created or enhanced, and connected directly to the Owner(s) and guests.

Vripack’s interior design was carefully developed to embody this Human-Centered Design philosophy. The result is a warm, at-home feeling, with views to enjoy from nearly every vantage point, inside or out.
title: The 50m Human-Centered Design

descriptions.title: Overview
descriptions.description:
Fifth Avenue Yachting

With Maharani, the creative duo behind the Dutch design studio Vripack, and the envelope-pushing YachtCreators division of The New Yachts Company, have essentially ripped up the standard 50-meter megayacht layout and started over from scratch.

"We improved the ‘industry standard’ by more than 300%. Maharani’s main deck has 50m of clear deck space offering ten dedicated areas. From the layout it’s obvious that each of these spaces have their own intimacy and function. This allows all family members to enjoy their own time on board while still being together all on one incredible deck stretching from stern to bow,"  says Bart Bouwhuis, co-creative director of Vripack.

"Guest privacy was a major focus, so the upper deck is the second full deck dedicated solely to the Owner and family… This allows everyone onboard to feel at home at sea, each respecting and enjoying their own space," remarks Barin Cardenas, founder of The New Yachts Company.

Create with Confidence, while benefitting from a thoroughly engineered platform designed by an elite team of naval architects, master builders and interior designers.

descriptions.title: Specifications
descriptions.description:
Boat Type:   Displacement Motor Yacht

Builder: Bloemsma (The Netherlands) or Burger Boat Company (USA)

Naval Architecture & Engineering: Azure Naval Architecture & Yacht Design

Exterior Design: Vripack

Interior Design:  Vripack

 

LOA: 49.44m (162ft)

Beam: 8.80m (28.9ft)

Draft, Fully Loaded: 2.15m (7.1ft)

Displacement: 390 Metric Tons

Hull & Superstructure: Aluminum

 

Power: 2x MTU 8V 2000 M72

Max Speed: 16 knots

Cruise Speed: 13 knots

Range at Cruise: +/- 4,000 nm

Fuel Capacity: 50,000 L

Fresh Water Capacity: 12,000 L

Gross Tonnage: <500GT

 

Guest Accommodations: 5 staterooms, master up, 10-12 guests

Crew Accommodations:  5 cabins, 10 crew

descriptions.title: Resort Yacht Experience
descriptions.description: Maharani is a genuine Resort Yacht Experience, offering multiple entertainment areas to be enjoyed day or night, at rest or underway. All guest areas, interior and exterior, are fully accessible to everyone, without the need for stairs. Outdoor entertaining is further enhanced by flexible furniture arrangements to accommodate larger groups or intimate gatherings.

descriptions.title: Accommodations
descriptions.description:
The Owner’s Suite is ideally situated in the most comfortable location on the yacht, and has convenient, direct access to the Beach Club & Spa. In fact, the Owner’s Suite and the four (4) double Guest Staterooms all have a direct, same-level corridor straight through the Beach Club & Day Spa to the large swim platform.

By placing both the Owner and Guest Staterooms on the Guest Deck, the PRIME Team created a forward-facing Skylounge on the Main Deck, further enhancing Maharani’s megayacht look and feel.

And to create a dedicated leisure zone on the Foredeck, the Team repurposed the yachts’ forward tender garage for use as a large 7.7-meter long swimming pool.

Furthermore, all mooring equipment was hidden under the Main Deck, and a glass bulwark was placed all around, creating a spacious, wind-free outdoor lounging experience.

descriptions.title: Beach Club and Spa
descriptions.description:
Maharani’s spacious Beach Club & Spa opens up to the surroundings via a stern hatch and portside beach platform. It boasts a flush-mounted hot tub for up to five (5) guests, a steam room, sauna, shower, gym, balcony, and an-all glass stern door. In a word… spectacular! 

The Beach Club & Spa is easily accessible while on the Guest Deck. From all staterooms, there is a direct, same-level corridor leading straight to the Beach Club and to the large swim platform, perfect for an early morning swim in the ocean.

descriptions.title: Sky Lounge
descriptions.description:
Featuring massive, forward facing windows, the Sky Lounge has direct access to the foredeck entertaining area.

Virtually all luxury areas above the Main Deck are surrounded by full-height glass, creating bright interiors and spectacular panoramic views. The open-plan layout in the main Salon and Dining Area further enhances this full panorama experience.

With the main Lounge facing the stern, and the Sky Lounge facing the bow, Maharani provides her guests with 360° views from all luxury areas at any time. The Sky Lounge not only acts as the perfect area from which to keep an eye on children playing in the pool, it is also a great place to relax and enjoy the view while cruising to the next exotic destination.

descriptions.title: Wheelhouse
descriptions.description:
The Wheelhouse and Captain’s Cabin features a dedicated staircase with direct access to the Main Deck.

Navigation Equipment:

• Radar installation : 2x Furuno

• Autopilot : 1x C. Plath

• AIS : 1x Furuno

• GPS : 2x Furuno

• Speed log : 1x Furuno

• Depth sounder : 1x Furuno

• Wind instruments : 1x Furuno

• Plotter : 1x Transas

• Magnetic compass : 2x C. Plath

• Gyro compass : 2x C. Plath

Communication Equipment:

• VHF : 2x Sailor

• Navtex : 1x Furuno

• Inmarsat C / LRIT : 1x Sailor

• Fleet 77 : 1x Nera

• PABX : 1x Panasonic

• GSM : 1x Sagem Dr. Neuhaus

descriptions.title: Engine Room
descriptions.description: Close collaboration between the PRIME Megayacht Platform founders and Azure’s design & engineering team resulted in the redistribution of space on Maharani to house the propulsion system in the Tank Deck. With said Deck now resembling the engine room layout of large sailing yachts, a tremendous amount of luxury space was opened up on the Guest Deck. In essence, a 70+ meter yachting experience was created on a 50 meter yacht.

dealerListings.description:
WINNER: 2020's Best New Series by Boat International

LeVen 90 Flybridge 2021

LeVen 90, the Ultimate Exumas Superyacht. 2020's Best New Series, Dutch built & engineered, and loaded with groundbreaking tech. 

Navigate the shallows with a class-leading 4.5' draft, and access those impossible-to-reach exotic beaches in superyacht comfort. Let time slip away while soaking in the sun. Let the ocean become your personal playground. LeVen is luxury island living.

Starting from $8.4M with only a 16-month build time. Personalize to your unique tastes.
dealerListings.title: The Ultimate Exumas Superyacht

descriptions.title: Inspiration:
descriptions.description: From the Dutch word “leven”, which means both “life” and “to live,” LeVen Yachts celebrates the Exumas cruising lifestyle. The inspiration for YachtCreators and Lucas Silva in developing LeVen was yachting families who enjoy active, outdoor living in casual elegance.

descriptions.title: Purpose:
descriptions.description: YachtCreators assembled a Dutch dream team for LeVen; specifically, to create the ultimate superyacht for yachting families like the Silvas, ones with genuine passion for cruising Bahamian waters. Furthermore, a superyacht with the requisite speed, comfort, range and seaworthiness to take-on the often unpredictable sea conditions encountered between islands.

descriptions.title: Notable Options:
descriptions.description:
The MSRP listed for hull #2 includes the following upgrades over the base boat:

  • Hardtop, aluminum
  • Seakeeper gyro stabilization
  • Underwater lights
  • Engine upgrade to MTU 12V2000 M93

descriptions.title: Personalization:
descriptions.description:
• Class selection (e.g. RINA pleasure class) 
  • Solar package
  • Skylounge
  • Hull color
  • Other options available

descriptions.title: Voith Linear Jet Propulsion:
descriptions.description: For LeVen, YachtCreators ingeniously proposed something never before seen in the yachting industry … the Voith linear jet propulsion system. Indeed, LeVen is the first yacht in the world to take advantage of the Voith linear jet propulsion system. The Voith system not only solved the shallow draft specification, it also provides low noise & vibration levels as well.

descriptions.title: Slide Hull Design:
descriptions.description:
Internationally acclaimed for outside-the-box thinking, Vripack proposed their patented hard chine Slide Hull design for LeVen … their largest to date, in fact.

The Slide Hull directs water flow in a way that resembles going down a slide. Compared to a planing hull, the design affords LeVen certain key advantages, such as: improved ride quality, reduced pounding, and no bow rise as the yacht gets up on plane. This, combined with twin MTU 12V2000 engines, gives LeVen the ability to reach speeds in excess of 26 knots.

descriptions.title: Dutch DNA:
descriptions.description: The final phase for YachtCreators was to select a proper shipyard … one with the pedigree and stability worthy of LeVen, and with the flexibility to successfully manage the wealth of new technology. That shipyard is Van der Valk. With their rich history of premium custom builds, remarkable client retention rate, and infectious enthusiasm, Van der Valk is the perfect fit for LeVen.

descriptions.title: Great Room at Sea:
descriptions.description:
Taking a cue from luxury beach home designs, LeVen’s main deck is open, bright, and features a massive Chef’s Table-style galley forward. In essence a Great Room at sea, the main deck is ideally suited for entertaining friends and family, and the perfect venue for guests to gather, socialize, etc. while enjoying 360-degree ocean views. 

 “LeVen is for yachting families who crave connection with nature,” says YachtCreators founder Barin Cardenas, “without sacrificing luxury comforts and amenities at sea.”

LeVen’s side windows are enormous, as is the front windshield. Courtesy of a cleverly designed mechanism, the windshield opens to allow cool Bahamian breezes to flow uninterrupted from the galley to the aft dining deck, further highlighting the bright living space and sense of connection with nature onboard.

descriptions.title: Dining Deck:
descriptions.description:
Dining onboard LeVen is extraordinary, as the dining area claims an entire deck… a feature normally found only on 40-meter+  yachts. Moreover, the dining deck serves as an extension to both the galley and salon, thus completing the Great Room effect.

The open general arrangement philosophy continues aft, with an innovative lanai deck designed to host guests in a comfortable lounge-style setting before or after dinner.

descriptions.title: Sports Deck:
descriptions.description: Lastly, the expansive sports deck…named for its massive hidden storage trunk, which stores everything from scuba gear to stand-up paddle boards. This, along with the versatile forward and flybridge decks, empowers guests onboard LeVen to thoroughly enjoy both ocean and sun, from sunbathing to spearfishing, to jet skiing and more.

descriptions.title: End Result:
descriptions.description: LeVen is a tough-yet-luxurious, RINA-classed, Dutch-engineered & manufactured superyacht built entirely in renewable aluminum. She’s capable of speeds in excess of 26kts, has a range at cruise of over 400nm, and a class-leading draft of only 1.37m (4’6”).

descriptions.title: About YachtCreators:
descriptions.description: We create and yachts and yacht brands. With 60+ new builds to date, YachtCreators has garnered critical acclaim & success with award-winning builds, such as the 55-meter Laurentia by Heesen and the 38-meter NONO by Admiral, and with numerous covers and columns in The Superyacht Report and Boat International. In the process, we forged solid, lasting relationships with elite builders, renowned designers and visionary architects from around the world. Learn what it means to DREAM BUILD PLAY with YachtCreators today.
